title: Small studio, 1 pkg included. Hardwd fls. kitchen and bath.
posting_body: Located on the 2nd floor in multi family.
This unit has a separate entrance, small kitchen and
Hardwood floors and a good size closet.
The main room is small, but can hold a full size
bed, a bureau, desk and chair.
No pets or smoking, laundry facilities in the building.
Tenant responsible for heat, hot water and electric.
Tenant must be employed and have a good credit
There is a real estate fee of $950 if you rent this unit.
When responding, please tell me what you do for work,
your credit score, your move in date, cell number
